text: @NYGovCuomo Kudo's to Governor for being one of the few Democrats to discuss reopening for what it is - "how much is a life worth". Republicans like to think of themselves as the party of faith. Dont think Jesus would have sold out his followers for any price #coronavirus @melissadderosa
